SamPy.stis.STISCCDSpectroscopyFlat.MakeFlat¶

class SamPy.stis.STISCCDSpectroscopyFlat.MakeFlat(input, output)¶

This class can be used to generate a pixel-to-pixel flat field from given data files.

__init__(input, output)¶
Parameters:
  • input – an input directory
  • output – an output directory

Methods

CombineFinalFlatS(list, headerl, headerm, raws) Combines all idicidual images to form a single combined flat field for each given mode.
MakeCopies() Copies newly created p-flat files over to a new directory and
__init__(input, output)
param input:an input directory
combine(filelist, output[, crsigmas]) Combines all files in filelist using ocrreject PyRAF task.
crreject(filelist) Runs CalSTIS for each file in the file list.
make50CDD(files[, colnodes, rownodes]) Makes a flat field from all files that has been taken with clear
make52X2(files, slitpos[, colnodes, rownodes]) Makes a flat field from all files that has been taken with a long slit in the light path (52x2).
